Setting.name: KeywordCasing
Setting.Title: KeywordCasing_Title
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets the keyword casing option to use during script generation

Setting.name: SqlVersion
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets the Sql version to generate script for

Setting.name: SqlEngineType
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets the Sql engine type (All|Engine|Azure) to generate script for

Setting.name: IndentationSize
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets the number of spaces to use when indenting text

Setting.name: IncludeSemicolons
Setting.Title: IncludeSemicolons_Title
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if a semi colon should be included after each statement

Setting.name: NumNewlinesAfterStatement
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets the number of newlines to include after each statement

Setting.name: AlignColumnDefinitionFields
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if column definition fields (column name, data type, constraints) should be aligned into alignment columns.

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeFromClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if there should be a newline before the FROM clause in a SELECT statement

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeWhereClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if there should be a newline before the WHERE clause in a SELECT statement

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeGroupByClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if there should be a newline before the GROUP BY clause in a SELECT statement

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeOrderByClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if there should be a newline before the ORDER BY clause in a SELECT statement

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeHavingClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if there should be a newline before the HAVING clause in a SELECT statement

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeWindowClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if there should be a newline before the WINDOW clause in a SELECT statement

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeJoinClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if there should be a newline before the JOIN clause in a SELECT statement

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeOffsetClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if there should be a newline before the OFFSET clause

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeOutputClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if there should be a newline before the OUTPUT clause

Setting.name: AlignClauseBodies
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if the bodies of FROM, WHERE, GROUP BY, etc. clauses should be aligned

Setting.name: MultilineSelectElementsList
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if select elements should be listed as a multi-line list

Setting.name: MultilineWherePredicatesList
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if WHERE predicates (expressions separated by AND, and OR) should be written on multiple lines

Setting.name: IndentViewBody
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if the view statement body should be indented.

Setting.name: MultilineViewColumnsList
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if view statement columns should be listed as a multi-line list

Setting.name: AsKeywordOnOwnLine
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if the AS keyword should be written on its own line

Setting.name: IndentSetClause
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if the SET clause for an UPDATE statement should be indented

Setting.name: AlignSetClauseItem
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if SET clause items in an UPDATE statement should be aligned

Setting.name: MultilineSetClauseItems
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if SET clause items should be listed on multiple lines

Setting.name: MultilineInsertTargetsList
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if the INSERT column targets list should be spread across multiple lines

Setting.name: MultilineInsertSourcesList
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if the INSERT column sources list should be spread across multiple lines

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeOpenParenthesisInMultilineList
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if a newline should be placed before an open parenthesis when writing a multi-line list in parenthesis

Setting.name: NewLineBeforeCloseParenthesisInMultilineList
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if a newline should be placed before an close parenthesis when writing a multi-line list in parenthesis

Setting.name: AllowExternalLibraryPaths
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if file paths can be used for external library content

Setting.name: AllowExternalLanguagePaths
Setting.Summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating if file paths can be used for external language content
